caption: The video recounts how, before dawn, many soldiers were awakened in their barracks and told to travel long distances to reach the trenches and stand by. At the same time, on a train, many gentlemen and men in black clothes and black hats were led to a point. A soldier in the trenches took out a poster of a woman and put it on the wall as a consolation. Meanwhile, in a train, a number of men in black suits were having some grim meetings with another group of men in military fatigues.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, decades ago, now, or in the future?
global.answer: It happens decades ago, most likely during a world war.

global.question: Are there more then five different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than five different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at night and day time.

global.question: Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?

breakpoint.question: what's the man in the middle of the scene doing?
breakpoint.answer: He's trying to watch something quietly.
